identification_code_qualifier_03.description:
1 D-U-N-S Number, Dun & Bradstreet
9 D-U-N-S+4, D-U-N-S Number with Four Character Suffix 11 Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA)

Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)
identification_code_qualifier_03.title: Identification Code Qualifier

identification_code_04.description:
DUNS, DUNS+4, or DEA as per N103 qualifier. Generally, non-Rx utilize DUNS variations while Rx use DEA. If there is a case where a DUNS is utilized for a Rx item, then the DEA should be provided in the N2 segment. The DUNS is required for our logistics partner, Descartes

Code identifying a party or other code

- This segment, used alone, provides the most efficient method of providing organizational identification. To obtain this efficiency the "ID Code" (N104) must provide a key to the table maintained by the transaction processing party.
identification_code_04.title: Identification Code

packaging_code_01.description:
PLT is applicable to all Non-RX warehouse shipments. The other codes may apply to RX items and Store shipments.

Code identifying the type of packaging; Part 1: Packaging Form, Part 2: Packaging Material; if the Data Element is used, then Part 1 is always required
packaging_code_01.title: Packaging Code

unit_or_basis_for_measurement_code_08.title: Unit Or Basis For Measurement Code

unit_or_basis_for_measurement_code_10.title: Unit Or Basis For Measurement Code

identification_code_03.description:
Standard Carrier Abbreviation Code (SCAC)

Code identifying a party or other code
identification_code_03.title: Identification Code

routing_05.description:
Carrier's Identity

Free-form description of the routing or requested routing for shipment, or the originating carrier's identity
routing_05.title: Routing

carrier_details_routing_sequence_transit.title: Carrier Details Routing Sequence Transit Time

equipment_number_03.description:
Trailer Number / Air Bill Number

Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)
equipment_number_03.title: Equipment Number

reference_identification_02.description:
Bill of Lading Number, if REF01 = BM Carrier's Reference Number, if REF01 = CN Tracking Number, if REF01 = 2I (Optional)

Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier
reference_identification_02.title: Reference Identification

location_qualifier_02.description:
OR Origin (Shipping Point)
PS 5-Digit US Zip Code
PU 6-Digit Canadian Postal Code

Code identifying type of location

- FOB02 is the code specifying transportation responsibility location.
location_qualifier_02.title: Location Qualifier

description_03.description:
A general, free form message regarding FOB status of the shipment. Example: "At Dock"

A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content
description_03.title: Description

unit_or_basis_for_measurement_code_03.title: Unit Or Basis For Measurement Code

unit_or_basis_for_measurement_code_06.title: Unit Or Basis For Measurement Code
